# Problem 1

## Part 1

```{r}
Random_subset |> select(year, sex, name, n) |>
  filter(n>40) |>
  filter(n<85)
```

## Part 2

```{r}
Random_subset |> filter(nchar(name) == 6)
```

## Part 3

```{r}
Random_subset |> mutate(total = n/prop)
```

## Part 4

```{r}
babynames |> rename(total = n) |>
  select(year, total) |>
  summarize(n_distinct(year))
```
